entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain. High zero except plus 4 across upper Richelieu.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain beginning in the morning except rain across upper Richelieu in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 15 mm across upper Richelieu. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High zero except plus 4 across upper Richelieu. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain near midnight. Rain across upper Richelieu in the evening. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
